title: Example 5—TEXT Format on a Hadoop Distributed File Server
originalFilePath: >-

---

* * *

Creates a readable external table, *ext_expenses,* using the `pxf` protocol. The column delimiter is a pipe ( \| ).

```
=# CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_expenses ( name text, 
   date date,  amount float4, category text, desc1 text ) 
   LOCATION ('pxf://dir/data/filename.txt?PROFILE=hdfs:text') 
   FORMAT 'TEXT' (DELIMITER '|');

```

Refer to [Accessing External Data with PXF](pxf-overview.mdx) for information about using the WarehousePG Platform Extension Framework (PXF) to access data on a Hadoop Distributed File System.

**Parent topic:** [Examples for Creating External Tables](creating-external-tables---examples.mdx)
